title: Starter Warfare Soundpack V1.4.2 - Gun and Explosion SFX for Creators
description: Gun and Explosion Sound Effects for Creators!! 355, 110 MB of 44.1kHz, 24 bit and Mono/Stereo WAV Sound Effect Files! Free updates!
longDescription:
THANK YOU for supporting!


Watch the Demo: Youtube: Warfare Soundpack

All the Sounds here: https://youtu.be/aVq0jC3OTAA

Soundlist here: Soundlist


  • The MOST customizable Sound Effects (SFX) available!
  • 357 SFX files with 5 gunshot variations per gun!
  • These are not just raw, layered Gunshots/Explosions! These have meticulous audio post production techniques applied to get distinct, high quality sounds!
  • Weapon SFX stems have the same starting points, so you don't have to guess where to position the different layers!
  • "Stems" refer to the entire audio file (including the silence) not just the waveform
  • CHOOSE between individual stems/layers to customize sound effects (SFX) the way YOU want using our BYOA line-up (Build Your Own Audio), OR utilize the "Prebuilt" SFX in the sound pack, and just drag and drop!!


Does your content need a touch of warfare? Check this out!! Why buy large soundpacks with a bunch of sounds you don't need in smaller bit depths when you can buy just what you need at a higher quality bit depth?!


Explosions, Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun, and SMG SFX! Includes gun handling, bullet casings, and other "sweeteners" for creating the PERFECT warfare experience!


Sound Effects are 44.1kHz, 16 bit and Mono/Stereo WAV files


Reverb stems come in mono and stereo

Prebuilt SFX are in stereo

releaseInfo.releaseNote: new version with adjustments to sfx start times and added push/pull sfx
